Name: Cunningham
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of blood orange zest twist (flamed) and skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail then discard.
Review: Reminiscent of a Blood and Sand with Bénédictine and lemon juice replacing sweet vermouth.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Marco Dionysos at Tres Agaves, San Francisco, USA and in memory of Johnny Cunningham (1957 - 2003), one of the world's all-time great Scottish fiddlers.
Nutrition: One serving of Cunningham contains 227 calories
